attributes.action: Hold a general election by the end of 2022
attributes.additional_details: The lack of any real form of intelligent decision making held by the current pm and his government needs to be addressed. The public are fed up of the current pm's running of the country and the only way to move forward is to have a competent leader which can be only implemented by holding a general election.
attributes.background: Hold a general election within a reasonable time period but before the current parties end date of office

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want there to be an election before the end of 2022, but we're not sure exactly what you mean when you say you want this to happen "before the current parties end date of office".

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Hold a general election in 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/571548
